oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oxidation of Carbene-Derived Selenium Diiodide with Silver Tetrafluoroborate Isolation of Iodonium Ion Complexes with Selones
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MANJARE, ST
SINGH, HB
BUTCHER, RJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Iodine
Tellurium
Carbenes
Selenium
RAY CRYSTAL-STRUCTURES
HYPERVALENT IODINE
STRUCTURAL-CHARACTERIZATION
HETEROCYCLIC THIOAMIDES
MOLECULAR-STRUCTURE
ANTITHYROID DRUGS
CHARGE-TRANSFER
FT-RAMAN
ADDUCTS
SALTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The oxidation reactions of diiodoselones 10a and 10b with silver tetrafluoroborate afford linear complexes of iodonium ions with selones 13a and 13b. The decomposition of the tellurium tetraiodide adduct with benzimidazolin-2-selone (12) in chloroform also affords a similar iodonium ion complex 13c. Crystal structure analysis of 13a13c shows interesting supramolecular formation by CHF, CHBr, CHI, Se, and I interactions.
